Key Match Events: Washington Sundar scored 50 runs off 28 balls with a strike rate of 178.57.
Pre-Game Insights: Hardik Pandya resumed T20I captaincy for India.
Ruturaj Gaikwad was ruled out of the series with a wrist injury.
Shubman Gill and Ishan Kishan were set to open for India.
New Zealand aimed to bounce back in the T20Is after being whitewashed in the ODIs.
Mitchell Santner took over the captaincy for New Zealand from Tom Latham.
Ish Sodhi was fit and had great numbers in India with 16 wickets from ten games and an economy of 6.64.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Ranchi is a bowl-first venue, with chasing teams winning 16 of the 25 T20 games hosted there.
Dew was expected to play a big role in the second innings.
India had won all three T20Is played in Ranchi so far, including one against New Zealand in November 2021.
